GK16ujjvni_u:4924: ūṣā-niruddhayor yadvat kvacit svapno'py abādhitaḥ // RUnm_15.217 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4926: prāptāni maṇḍanādīni dṛśyante jāgare'pi ca // RUnm_15.218 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4931: ity eṣa hari-bhāvasya vilāsaḥ ko'pi peśala |
GK16ujjvni_u:4932: citra-svapnam ivātanvan kṛṣṇaḥ saṅgamayaty alam // RUnm_15.220 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4934: ye'nubhāva-daśām asyāḥ prāpnuvanti rateḥ sphuṭam // RUnm_15.221 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4935: te tu sandarśanaṃ jalpaḥ sparśanaṃ vartma-rodhanam |
GK16ujjvni_u:4943: kula-sthitir alaṃ tu me manasi tāvad unmīlati |
GK16ujjvni_u:4945: na yāvad aparokṣatām idam apaiti vaktrāmbujam // RUnm_15.225 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4947: jalpaḥ parasparaṃ goṣṭhī vitathoktiś ca kathyate // RUnm_15.226 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4950: yad etā daśanair eṣa daśan nāpnoti maṅgalam // RUnm_15.227 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4954: tvaṃ rādhe śiva-mūrtir ity urasi māṃ bhogīndram aṅgīkuru // RUnm_15.228 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4956: asminn adrau kati na hi mayā hanta hārādi-vittaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:4961: na kuru śapatham asya sparśato dūṣitoccair
GK16ujjvni_u:4964: kapaṭini paritas te paśya romāñcitāsti // RUnm_15.230 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4969: tvayā gantuṃ śakyā taraṇi-duhitus tīra-saraṇī // RUnm_15.231 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4973: vadhūś ca taḍid-ujjvalā prati-harid vayaṃ madhyataḥ
GK16ujjvni_u:4979: vilasati tava vaśyā paśya vṛndāṭavīyam // RUnm_15.233 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4982: mālyaṃ bhaṅgam avāpa vīra tilako yātaḥ kilādṛśyatām |
GK16ujjvni_u:4983: vaktrendau pratimā-cchalena śaraṇaṃ labdhaḥ sakhīṃ kaustubhas
GK16ujjvni_u:4984: tan mā bhūś cakito vimukta-cikuraṃ nārdaty asau tvad-vidham // RUnm_15.234 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4992: navyā ca naur iti vacas tava tathyam eva |
GK16ujjvni_u:4994: tvaṃ cañcalo yad iha mādhava nāviko'si // RUnm_15.236 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4998: nīcair nyāsād atha caraṇayor nūpura mūkayantī
GK16ujjvni_u:5001: smitvā smitvā harati muralīm aṅkato mādhavasya // RUnm_15.238 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5003: chadāvali-vṛtaiva naḥ sapadi kācid ekā vrajaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5005: ayaṃ guṇa-nidhis taror upari tābhir abhyarcyatām
GK16ujjvni_u:5008: ayi jñātaṃ jñātaṃ harasi hariṇākṣi pratidinaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5009: tvam eva pracchannā mama sumanasāṃ mañjarim itaḥ |
GK16ujjvni_u:5010: cirād diṣṭyā cauri tvam iha vidhṛtādya svayam ato
GK16ujjvni_u:5011: guhākārām ārāt praviśa vasatiṃ prauḍhibhir alam // RUnm_15.240 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5015: manye vidhitsatha tad atra gires taṭeṣu
GK16ujjvni_u:5019: kuñje vañjula-śākhinaḥ śaśimukhī līnā varīvarti sā |
GK16ujjvni_u:5020: no ced eṣa tad-aṅghri-saṅgama-vinābhāvād akāle kathaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5026: na tu vadanaṃ muhur arthitāpi tena // RUnm_15.243 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5028: keyaṃ śyāmā sphurati sarale gopakanyā kimarthaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5029: prāptā sakhyaṃ tava mṛgayate nirmitāsau vayasyā |
GK16ujjvni_u:5030: āliṅgāmūṃ muhuriti tathā kurvatī māṃ viditvā
GK16ujjvni_u:5031: nārīveśam hriyamupayayau māninī yatra rādhā // RUnm_15.244 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5038: jitvā dyūta-paṇaṃ daśaty aghahare gaṇḍaṃ mudā dakṣiṇaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5039: sā vāmaṃ ca daśeti tatra rabhasād akṣaṃ kṣipanty abhyadhāt |
GK16ujjvni_u:5040: ājñāṃ sundari te yatheti hariṇā vāme ca daṣṭe tataḥ
GK16ujjvni_u:5041: saṃrambhād iva sā bhujā-latikayā kaṇṭhe babandha priyam // RUnm_15.246 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5044: smitvā smitvā mayi kuca-paṭīṃ kṛṣṭavaty unmadena |
GK16ujjvni_u:5046: niṣṭhīvan yaḥ kiraṇa-laharīṃ hrepayāmāsa rādhām // RUnm_15.247 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5058: na kucāv imau gatijitā tayā hṛtaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5071: sārdhaṃ rādhikayā harer nidhuvana-krīḍā-vidhir vardhate // RUnm_15.252 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5073: na tathā samprayogeṇa syād evaṃ rasikā viduḥ // RUnm_15.253 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5078: ratād api sukhaṃ harer adhikam ādadhe rādhayā // RUnm_15.254 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5083: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ suratotsavād api navāsvādaṃ vitene sukham // RUnm_15.255 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5088: udbhūtaḥ sa tayor babhūva suratārambhaḥ priyambhāvukaḥ // RUnm_15.256 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5093: ity ādyā vraja-devīnāṃ preyasī praṇayoktayaḥ // RUnm_15.258 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5095: spṛṣṭaḥ paraṃ taṭasthena rasābdhir madhuro mayā ||o||
